html: Please RT. Missing since 12th May ‘18 Name: Arshad. Age. 13 yrs. Last seen at Mahim, Mumbai wearing a white T-Shirt & jeans. Arshad has Downs Syndrome & is incapable of communicating his address or parents phone numbers. If found please contact Taju on +91 77180 42756pic.twitter.com/tWn59cbsMM
text:
Please RT. 
Missing since 12th May ‘18
Name: Arshad. Age. 13 yrs. 
Last seen at Mahim, Mumbai wearing a white T-Shirt & jeans. 
Arshad has Downs Syndrome & is incapable of communicating his address or parents phone numbers.  
If found please contact Taju on +91 77180 42756pic.twitter.com/tWn59cbsMM
